name: Awry
description:
Four RPG heroes arrive at the final boss battle! Except... they are possessed and turn evil. You have to defeat the boss while making sure they don't kill each other!

Controls

Control Character - [1][2][3][4]

Move - [W][A][S][D]

Attack - [LEFT MOUSE]

Advance Dialogue - [SPACE]

Credits

@impuuuu - Design, Code

@hexxagon - Art

@StevenColling - Art

Miki - Music

Made for GMTK Jam 2020.
